issue.title: [CI][Crossbow] Nightly build email should distinguish between new failures and still failing builds
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7191](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7191). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It would help with triaging the nightly build status if it were more readily visible which builds broke today vs. are still broken (and were triaged yesterday).
